references.title: WHATWG HTML spec for the inert attribute

assertions.title: disable keyboard functionality (navigation and operation)
assertions.rationale: The inert attribute will prevent all click events for mouse users and hide content from assistive technologies, so it should also be removed from the tab order.
examples: It is not possible to tab to anything contained within an element that has the inert attribute.

assertions.title: remove content from the reading order
assertions.rationale: Per the HTML specification, the inert attribute is expected to hide all contained content from assistive technologies.
examples: It is not possible to read anything contained within an element that has the inert attribute.
